name: Jingliang Liao
body:
### About Me
I am a 3th-year M.S. candidate at the College of Computer Science and Technology, [Huaqiao University](http://www.hqu.edu.cn/) and my adviser is Dr. Yiqiao Cai. Previously, I received my B.S. degree from [Quanzhou Normal University](http://www.qztc.edu.cn/) in 2012. The best way to reach me is through email: KD1900@163.com.

***
### Research Interests
* Artificial Intelligence :: Evolutionary Computation
* Artificial Intelligence :: Machine Learning

***
### Education
*  2013~Present :: M.S. :: College of Computer Science and Technology, Huaqiao University, China. Supervisor: Dr. Yiqiao Cai
*  2008~2012 :: B.Eng. :: College of Mathematics and Computer Science, Quanzhou Normal University, China.

***
### Experiences
* update...

***
### Publications
 5. Yiqiao Cai, **Jingliang Liao**, Yonghong Chen, Tian Wang, Hui Tian: Differential Evolution with Neighborhood-dependent Mutation Operators. _Information Sciences_ (Submitted)
 4. **Jingliang Liao**, Yiqiao Cai, Yonghong Chen, Tian Wang, Hui Tian: Differential Evolution Enhanced with Composite Population Information Based Mutation Operators. _Journal of Digital Information Management_, 2015
 3. **Jingliang Liao**, Yiqiao Cai, Tian Wang, Hui Tian, Yonghong Chen: Cellular direction information based differential evolution for numerical optimization: an empirical study. _Soft Computing_, 2015
 2. Zewu Peng, **Jingliang Liao**, Yiqiao Cai: Differential evolution with distributed direction information based mutation operators: an optimization technique for big data. _Journal of Ambient Intelligence and Humanized Computing_, 2015
 1. **Jingliang Liao**, Yiqiao Cai, Yonghong Chen, Tian Wang: Improving Differential Evolution with Ring Topology-Based Mutation Operators. _International Conference on P2P, Parallel, Grid, Cloud and Internet Computing (3PGCIC)_, 2014 

***

* update...

### Awards
* 1st Place : Huaqiao University ACM Programming Contest (Graduate Group), 2013

* National Encouragement scholarship, 2009 

***
### Skills
* C, C++, Java, Python，JavaScript，Matlab, PHP, Go, Shell, Scala
* Spark, Hadoop, MySQL
* Visual Studio, Eclipse, Android Studio
* LaTeX, Origin, Adobe Illustrator
